product_description: Treat yourself to a bake shop quality snack with Tate's Bake Shop Walnut Chocolate Chip Cookies. These chocolate chip walnut cookies feature semisweet chocolate chips and crunchy walnuts for a mouthwatering flavor combination. Deeply delicious, these thin cookies are uniquely crispy with a delightfully crunchy texture. Make party snacks a breeze when you fill your cookie trays with these kosher cookies, or share the delicious treat with your family and friends. This 7 ounce bag is reclosable to keep these crispy cookies fresh.

product_description: Simple Mills enriches lives and bodies through simple, delicious, real foods. We strive to make healthful choices easy by offering food that tastes great in the moment and nourishes your body for the long-term. We believe if you don’t recognize an ingredient, your body won’t either, so we handpick ours with purpose - only including things that nourish you. Nothing artificial, ever. We’re here to positively impact the way food is made, because we believe good health enables greater, passion-filled lives. Clean, nutritious foods, for a greater life. It’s that simple. Food has the ability to transform how you feel. We're raising the bar. Raising expectations that food can be both delicious and nourishing, so you can thrive. All Simple Mills products are made in North America (USA & Canada). short_description: One 24.75 oz party size pack of CHIPS AHOY! Chunky Chocolatey Chip Cookies
Delicious, crunchy cookies crafted with chocolatey chunks that are sure to become everyone's favorite chocolatey chip cookie snacks
Certified kosher cookies that make wonderful sweet treats for after-school snacks and office snacks
Sweet snacks that are fantastic for dessert tables, coffee breaks, or adding to party favors; great ice cream pairing for a deliciously happy treat
Easy-open, resealable package of snack cookies to help keep cookies in this larger party size pack fresh and ready to enjoy and share at parties and other get-togethers
Packaging may vary. Please refer to the actual packaging for current information for this product
product_description: CHIPS AHOY! Chunky Chocolatey Chip Cookies deliver delectable flavor to excite your tastebuds. Sweet snacks crafted with chocolatey chunks, these crispy cookies are baked to have just the right amount of crunch. Enjoy the chocolatey taste of these classic cookies that are sure to become a household favorite. Make lunches at school or work more exciting by packing these crunchy chocolatey chip cookies in lunchboxes, backpacks, and briefcases for delightfully sweet school snacks and office snacks, or use them to create delicious chocolatey chip cookie desserts for your next holiday party or gathering. Regardless of the occasion, these crunchy cookies are an anytime treat to enjoy on their own, with milk or coffee, or paired with ice cream for a deliciously sweet treat, whether crushed as an ice cream topper or to make an ice cream sandwich. The resealable, party size package with its easy-pull tab helps to keep these certified kosher cookies fresh, making them wonderfully shareable work snacks and party snacks.

Annie's makes products in over 20 family-friendly categories, from fruit flavored snacks and cereal to mac and cheese.
